Title: Series: Salvatoris Beatae Mariae Virginis Sanctorum Apostolorum Icones
Series: Les Grands Apôtres
Description: Virgin standing whole-length in landscape, facing front, with hands joined; in the background, representations of return from Egypt on the right and of the Assumption on the left c.1631 Etching
Curator's comments: For another impression and comment, see 1861,0713.197
Bibliographic references: Meaume 1860 / Recherches sur la vie et les ouvrages de Jacques Callot (106)
Acquisition notes: From the Scarisbrick collection of Callot's work: see comment on 1861,0713.1.
